dcterms:creator: L. R. Goldberg
et al.
dcterms:description: A standardized 100-item Big Five personality questionnaire used to evaluate response biases in large language models (LLMs). The questionnaire captures five personality traits: Extraversion, Openness to Experience, Conscientiousness, Agreeableness, and Neuroticism.
dcterms:title: Big Five personality questionnaire

dcterms:creator: L. R. Goldberg
et al.
dcterms:description: A public domain personality inventory measuring the lower-level facets of several five-factor models, utilized in the context of personality assessments for large language models.
dcterms:title: International Personality Item Pool (IPIP)

dcterms:creator: Q. Mei
Y. Xie
W. Yuan
M. O. Jackson
dcterms:description: A dataset used to conduct a Turing test assessing whether AI chatbots exhibit behavioral similarities to humans.
dcterms:title: Turing test dataset

dcterms:creator: M. Safdari
G. Serapio-García
C. Crepy
S. Fitz
P. Romero
L. Sun
M. Abdulhai
A. Faust
M. Matari´c
dcterms:description: A dataset exploring personality traits in large language models, examining how these traits correlate with performance in various tasks.
dcterms:title: Personality traits dataset
